data.text: Sɛ Efraim kasa a, na nnipa ho popo;
Afei wɔkɔ so yɛ bɔne ara;
Ɛno nti, wɔbɛyɛ sɛ anɔpa omununkum
Memaa wɔn aduan no, wodi mee;
Enti mɛtow ahyɛ wɔn so sɛ gyata,
Mɛtow ahyɛ wɔn so na matetew wɔn mu
Wo hene wɔ he na wabegye wo?
Enti mʼabufuw mu, memaa wo ɔhene,
Ɔbɛte ɔyaw te sɛ ɔbea a ɔreko awo,
“Mɛpata agye wɔn afi ɔda tumi mu.
mpo sɛ ɔyɛ yiye wɔ ne nuanom mu a.
Ɛsɛ sɛ nnipa a wɔwɔ Samaria gye wɔn afɔdi to mu,
